entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:20 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
